definition: A term used to describe the structure or shape of an object, often referring to its physical appearance or configuration. It is commonly employed in various fields such as art, design, mathematics, and science to denote the external or internal arrangement of something. Additionally, it can also refer to a standardized document or template used for official purposes.

examples.german: Die Form des Gebäudes ist sehr interessant.
examples.english: The shape of the building is very interesting.

examples.german: Bitte füllen Sie das Formular aus.
Die Künstlerin arbeitet mit verschiedenen Formen.
examples.english: The artist works with different forms.

examples.german: Die Form der Wolken erinnert mich an Tiere.
examples.english: The shape of the clouds reminds me of animals.

examples.german: Die Form der Flasche ist ergonomisch gestaltet.
examples.english: The shape of the bottle is ergonomically designed.
